Detailed Description

Interface of APS binding.

Definition in file apsmeBind.h.

Define Documentation

#define ACTIVE_BINDING_ENTRY_STATUS   APS_INVALID_BINDING_STATUS

The APS binding table allows ZigBee devices to establish designated destination for frames from a given source endpoint and with a given cluster ID. See ZigBee spec. r18, 2.2.8.2, page 65.

Definition at line 39 of file apsmeBind.h.

Function Documentation

bool APS_IsBoundToAnyGroup ( const ClusterId_t  clusterId,
const Endpoint_t  srcEndpoint 
)

Check binding to any group from given source endpoint.

Parameters:
[in]clusterId- cluster identifier of group binding link
[in]srcEndpoint- source endpoint of group binding link.
Returns:
true if group bind link is found otherwise return false.
void APS_FreeBindingEntry ( ApsBindingEntry_t *const  entry)

Free allocated binding entry.

Parameters:
[in]entry- pointer to valid entry in the binding table.
Returns:
None.
